faqs.question: Kan utlänningar köpa fastighet i Spanien?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. Non-EU citizens can purchase Spanish property without restrictions, though some requirements exist regarding NIE (Spanish tax identification number) and property registration. Our legal team assists with all documentation. Most families complete purchases within 6-8 weeks. Spanish banks offer mortgages to foreign buyers, simplifying the acquisition process significantly.

faqs.question: Vilka är kostnaderna för att köpa fastighet i Spanien?
faqs.answer: Beyond purchase price, expect approximately 10-12% in additional costs including: property transfer tax (6-10%), legal fees (600-1,200€), notary fees (300-500€), and registration costs (0.1% of value). Mortgage arrangements, if needed, involve additional professional fees. Our team provides transparent cost breakdowns before purchase, ensuring no surprises. These costs are competitive internationally and represent transparent, regulated expenses.
